title: Welcome to Qi Shao's World
subtitle: Experience Another Person's Life Through the Blogs
description: 爱自己 & 爱生活 & 爱科学

items.title: My First Photography Experience
items.content_html:
# 中文

一闪而过的想法造就了我第一次的摄影经历。我觉得自己需要一些其他的活动来填充我现在枯燥的生活。目前没有目标的生活很容易让我觉得无趣，思考了一段时间过后，我觉得我应该去摄影。不过微单确实太贵了，在我姐的建议下，先租了一个 XT30 试试顺不顺手（无奈，XE4 被租了）

先去了一大会址拍了一些照片，之后呢又去了外滩。作为新手，我成功邀请到了我姐作为我的第一任老师，希望这次的作品没有丢我姐的脸。不得不说，把我姐当作老师之后，我心里也一样会出现一种敬畏感，这可能是来自我骨子里的一种对老师尊敬抑或是恐惧，觉得自己仿佛变成了小孩子。今天忽然意识到，自己已经算是一个很大的成年人了，应该为自己的生活负责，无论以后过的什么样，这都是我自己走的路和选择的结果，我应该担负起一些责任了，至少不应该像一个小孩子一样随便的固执的玩耍，不计后果的做很多荒唐的事情。前几天看到了一段话，作为一个刚刚步入社会的成年人，在这个 20-30 岁的年龄段，迷茫永远是常态，但最需要记住的就是永远不要逃避你的责任，既然选择了一件事，或者接受了一件事，就把它做好，不要让逃避和偷懒变成了你的常态，要有勇气面对各种挑战。

我不知道未来的事情，但我知道，我依旧相信这个世界上拥有爱情，以及未来的家庭才是我最需要维护和照顾的地方，人都希望实现个人的价值，但在追求着之外，我也希望有一个甜甜而幸福的另一半，至少在别人问到她的时候，她会很高兴地很骄傲地和别人说” 和他在一起，我很幸福 “，目前看来，自己还需要在这点上继续努力啊！一定要加油啊，邵奇！

人生总归是有不平衡的，但是我知道，在一个不平衡的条件下，我已经做到了这不平衡的条件下我的最好了！

继续丰富和扩展你的生活吧，你有你的能力，你的能力创造着你的故事和你的奇迹，不要叹息生活的不公，要知道，无论什么，你的生活在你的手里，你的努力，也在你的手里发光！

把今天的照片列一下吧，希望没有丢我的” 老师 “的脸，希望大家也给反馈啊，我会虚心接受的！

# English note

The first photography experience is created by a flash idea that I want to do something to fill my boring daily life. Due to the lack of goal to guide my life, I choose the photography. Before I buy a mirrorless camera, I rent an XT30 to experience the difference of mirrorless camera and smartphone.

At noon, I got my XT30. But I feel panic. It is so expensive, I'm scare that if I will break it. I didn't know why I thought the zjx at that moment. Because I'm neverous? Maybe this is a point zjx dislike. Hope I could change this weakness. As a beginner, I invited a great teacher to guide how to take a beautiful photo.

We choosed The Shanghai Bund as the destination. We got the Bund at four o'clock at afternoon, I took many photos. As the works of first time, I think these photo is great.

I list some of them as follows, please give me your feedback, I will accept it humbly.

items.title: The First Formal Hi
items.content_html:
This is the first formal hi to everybody, duo to the thought of sharing my thoughts and life to all of the world, I use the English to say this hi!

Hi, everyone! Welcome to this place, I hope you can get happy and relax in this blogs. The initial purpose of this blogs is sharing my knowledge and life to get more cheer and encouragements from myself. Of course, if you want to give me an encouragement, I will be really cheerful and glad.

I will continue to add my daily experience and thoughts to this website. Hope I could give more people help.

The world give me a hit last year. I also thought it may be my fault taken up the major part of reasons. However, I stand up now and decided to pay more passion to love this world. I hope to have a look to this world and find out the best things and kind moments. This is also one of the use of this blogs.

The first beauitiful thing must be the people's good-looking, I respect to the person who share their beauty to other persons. It really can make other persons happy, for explame, me. Thank you, stranger, for your beautiful photograph which makes me happy all day.

items.title: Welcome to the blogs of Qi Shao
items.content_html: Thank you for your first visitation of my blogs, I don't have time now but I will update this blog on this evening, expect for your visitation at that moment!
